talk.author: did:plc:ku4cyf3lmc6lwmcnaixdvbix
talk.utter: Crows were carefully dropping blue squirrel poison in my horse's water. Rinsing? Gifting? Birdwatching friends told us to hang "fake dead crows" around the water bucket as deterrents. 💔tho, because we love corvids, and they will remember our treachery forever. (BTW neighbor was poisoning 🐿️ not us.)

talk.author: did:plc:ku4cyf3lmc6lwmcnaixdvbix
talk.utter: Yup. We had a fit about it and she stopped. Any! Thoughts on why crows would put the pellets in H20? So fascinating.
